FuncDef: The display sr-te policy traffic-statistics command displays SR-MPLS TE Policy traffic statistics.
CLIs: display sr-te policy traffic-statistics [ endpoint <ipv4-address> color <color-value> | policy-name <name-value> | binding-sid <binding-sid> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the endpoint of an SR-MPLS TE Policy.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the color value of an SR-MPLS TE Policy.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Specifies the name of an SR-MPLS TE Policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies a binding SID.
The value is an integer ranging from 16 to 1048575.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display sr-te policy traffic-statistics endpoint 10.1.23.42 color 100
Last 300 seconds output rate 53904976 bits/sec, 82174 packets/sec
Realtime 27 seconds output rate 169487752 bits/sec, 211857 packets/sec
Last 300 seconds output rate 13036984 bits/sec, 19874 packets/sec
Realtime 27 seconds output rate 84622672 bits/sec, 105777 packets/sec
Last 300 seconds output rate 40867992 bits/sec, 62300 packets/sec
Realtime 27 seconds output rate 84865080 bits/sec, 106080 packets/sec
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After configuring SR-MPLS TE Policy traffic statistics collection, run the display sr-te policy traffic-statistics command to check collected SR-MPLS TE Policy traffic statistics.
To clear existing SR-MPLS TE Policy traffic statistics, run the reset sr-te policy traffic-statistics command.
